data.name: Rhythm Knights - Deviation Perspective: Master of Ceremonies - Expansion Pack
data.detailed_description:
Rhythm Knights meets YIIK: A Post-Modern RPG in the Deviation Perspective: Master of Ceremonies - Expansion Pack.

Includes 1 Track.
data.about_the_game:
Rhythm Knights meets YIIK: A Post-Modern RPG in the Deviation Perspective: Master of Ceremonies - Expansion Pack.

Includes 1 Track.
data.short_description: The Rhythm Knights duel it out with Alex (YIIK: A Post-Modern RPG)!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, Intel HD 3000, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 430 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 Screen Resolution is recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 10240.0 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo at 2.2 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 2.2Ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460, AMD Radeon HD 6850
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 Screen Resolution is recommended.
